author: slava77
body:
save phase2 OT tracker used cluster masks in `ph2_usedMask` branch, similar to phase-1 branches

the code was tested back in 12_4 in time of the #39866 PR integration, but was never propagated to cmssw, since it was developed in a separate ntuple-related branch.
This is needed now with ramped up activity of mkFit phase-2 developments
title: add OT tracker cluster masks in TrackingNtuple
